website_summaries.verdict: A BB cream that provides light coverage and sun protection for a low cost.
pros: Available in 3 shades in a pack of 1 or 2
Provides light, sheer coverage that evens out skin tone without looking cakey
Sits at a low price point
Lasts for hours without melting off or smearing
cons: BB cream smells strongly of sunscreen

customer_reviews.title: ... Benefit “hello flawless oxygen wow” to this and I love it. I keep getting told that my make ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Benefit “hello flawless oxygen wow” to this and I love it. I keep getting told that my make up looks amazing...if they only knew how cheap it is
customer_reviews.author: Maria Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great for light coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've used many different bb creams over the years and I keep coming back to this one. Two main reasons: price and all-around great product. I love that it has spf, so I don't have to remember to put it on my face daily. It offers very light coverage, so my face doesn't look like I've got makeup caked on it. Does a great job evening out my skin tone and blends my freckles a little, but doesn't make them disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Buying Again
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I don't typically wear foundation and I've been using this product as a base, with powder on top. So lightweight, but smooths the tone of my skin. Does not feel oily or greasy. If you sweat within 30 mins of putting it on, it will come off (I tried putting it on for a morning bike ride once), but once it sets it lasts the whole day. I never see it on my gym towel at the end of the day. Love that it has SPF 21.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I think they discontinued my color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for about 10 or 15 years and can no longer find this color at stores. Only the 2 lighter colors. Amazon is a life savior having this in stock. I don’t use foundation, just this tinted moisturizer. It’s very natural looking and non-greasy.
customer_reviews.author: madenbrazil

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this BB Cream, it's probably the best cream that I have tried. It's very lightweight and leaves your skin an even tone without giving you the dreaded "cake face" look. I'm not one to always go for a full face of makeup so this is nice to get good coverage without a whole lot of time and effort. Plus it has SPF which is always a bonus in your makeup. I also like how it doesn't make me feel like a grease ball at the end of the day. Definitely will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: PythiaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with my purchase..good for my cinnamon brown complexion.
customer_reviews.text: I have decided to use this instead of the $30.00 foundation that I typically buy. It is really a great coverage for me. I am a cinnamon complexion and I purchased the medium which blended in pretty well with my tone. I would imagine it would be less effective on skin darker than mines because the cream is lighter than my skin tone. It is not a super thick coverage, which I like. It just gives me a young,fresh,and even glow that my foundation just doesn't quite provide. I do still use the foundation very sparingly, just to cover small hard to cover blemishes. I finish with a powder and I am set for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, it's not as long lasting as I would like
customer_reviews.text: I didn't hate it but I didn't love it either. It was good on a day where I needed lightweight coverage, but it faded a third of the way through the day. I felt seriously betrayed when I finally looked into a mirror lolol. I am pretty new to BB creams, so maybe that's just how they work? I don't really see myself using this again. I like to carry a small bag with me, which means not carrying most makeup with me. Anything that requires application throughout the day (aside from lip stuff) does not belong in my personal makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Manganello

customer_reviews.title: No coverage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoping it would be an inexpensive alternative to the $20+ BB creams out there. I use Marcelle and it is $30. This is basically a lightly tinted moisturizer. I typically can wear my expensive BB cream alone without applying powder or foundation. This gives only moisturizer and the tint is barely visible. Probably a good fit for someone that doesn't need foundation. I have significant acne scars so I need more coverage
customer_reviews.author: Jaylynn

customer_reviews.title: This bb cream is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Its so good in the face and i could feel my face is really moisturized when i use it. I like it cause its tinted and its seems like i dont need to put anything other than it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryleeperez08

customer_reviews.title: My No. #1 Base
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that I have extremely pale skin. It is hard to find a base that covers my skin tone not just adequately but well. Well, I am switched for life to this product. I do not want to try anymore after trying many different drugstore & luxury brand foundations/BB creams. In reading the product description, I was sold by the multifaceted benefits this cream provides. I am glad I chose this product. I hope this review influences your purchasing decision. I purchased this product at full price. I have not been paid, sponsored or given a discounted product for my review. I really love this product and hope you might try it too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I have been slowly started wearing make up, eye liner, mascara, lipstick... but really couldn’t get into wearing foundation. I don’t like the cake feeling and I don’t want to hassle with trying to find the right color. I saw an episode of Queer Eye, the team helped a prison guard feel pretty again. They recommended a similar product that would offer sun protection, a moisturizer and smooth out color imperfections. After watching the episode I decided to seek out a similar product. I love this and you will too! I just apply little dabs on my cheeks, nose, chin and forehead and then blend in with two fingers, as if I were blending in sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: sonia mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Offers very little actual coverage. I can't tell when ...
customer_reviews.text: Offers very little actual coverage. I can't tell when I've put it on. I may as well have bought just lotion. I wanted a light coverage to throw on when I'm not at work and this doesn't do that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Been using it for over a year
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Been using it for over a year. I use this instead of primer. Or foundation. I just put this on before powder then setting spray. I just love it. Makes every smooth and even and makes powder stick. A little goes a long way too. Adds a little moisture without being oily. And this is coming from someone with oily skin!👌👌👌
customer_reviews.author: Makeup Momma

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, doesn't make me breakout. A great weightless way to even out your complexion and apply sunscreen every day. For the record, I am a non-tan complected Caucasian. I usually use the fair to medium, but if I get a little sun or the occasional spray tan I need the medium to Dark. This is still for fairly light skinned individuals. It would be way to light for anyone with naturally brownish or mocha colored skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: My first package arrived opened, but Amazon was quick to replace it the very next day! This BB cream is pretty good! I love makeup, but sometimes I just want a lighter coverage, as makeup tends to settle in some of my fine wrinkles. This cream is not full coverage, so don’t expect to have every blemish covered. However it does even out my skin tone, and provide a lighter coverage. I just put a little powder over top of it and that’s it !
customer_reviews.author: BookedUp22

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad toxic chenicals
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has well know cancer causing ingredient called octinoxate... also messes with your estrogen and hormones and can cause poly ovarian cysts Read your labels ladies!!! Dr Oz had numerous professors on his show on 2009 professing how women in the AM get read for work routine put on products that contain 180 chemicals ... this dr warned women to go to simple and basic products not full of cancer causing chemicals...read your labels! Is it any wonder cancer institutes are breaking at the seams
customer_reviews.author: Tea lover

customer_reviews.title: What A Great Product for Getting Glowing Dewy Skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foundation cream. It is light, moisturizing, and protects the skin in mildly sunny, but not hot weather. I will have to wait and see how it works during hot summer days. It makes my skin glow. It doesn't cover darker spots well as it is extremely translucent. This foundation is good if you want a dewy healthy glow. It does help to reduce the appearance of large pores a little. I love it. It works well for those days I just want to be natural but look radiant.
customer_reviews.author: nisuelli

customer_reviews.title: A long time favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is a reorder of a long time favorite for a light make-up that I discovered years ago to replace a more pricey product I used. This is perfect to use for going to the gym or everyday moisturizing light make-up--especially at this "stay at home" time. My skin is fairly sensitive and it has never caused an allergy problem. I'm pleased to see it is still available as there was a concern that it was discontinued at a local vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Classy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'm an olive skin tone and got the light to medium. This product is pretty much an exact match to my skin tone. When applied, it gives me a more even/finished look under my makeup. I have good skin to begin with, but I feel like the moisturizer gives me a brighter, dewy look; especially when combined with the bronzer blush I use. This is NOT a foundation. So the couple blemishes I have at the moment were still somewhat visible (but I use coverstick for blemishes). I like using the moisturizer underneath my blush because I feel like there's a barrier between the blush brush and my skin, acting as a protectant and keeping everything smooth.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: cover girl rocks
customer_reviews.text: this is the best moisturizer ever better than avon (sorry). it is light and you don't know you have it on. I have been looking all over for the single pack (thank you). you can wear this when the weather is very hot and humid and it doesn't feel like you are wearing make up. cover girl rocks
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff. So easy.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good base for no makeup, makeup days and this is exactly what I wanted. I would definitely call this a tinted moisturizer not a BB cream. This and some concealor under the eyes is all I need. My face is moisturized, my skin tone is more even and the finish isn't matte or dewey. It's somewhere in between. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: chilly198619

customer_reviews.title: Natural look minimal coverage, Light moisturizing with spf
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been using it for years. Because I prefer a more natural look, I like the lighter base foundation and moisturizing. As I am getting older and need to get more coverage for uneven skin tone I wish I could find something that had the same natural look and feel. I combine a touch of the 3 in 1 ageless with it and a concealer for dark spots to even out the tone. In the summer I mix the 805 and the 810 together. I hope they never stop making this product, and maybe make a new one that has just a touch more coverage....
customer_reviews.author: Piroska Vajtay

customer_reviews.title: Very Sheer
customer_reviews.text: This BB cream is by fair the most light weight I've ever used. I normally use Tarte Shape Tape and Maybelline BB cream as my go to base, but I've become more adamant about only purchasing cruelty free makeup. I decided to give cover girl a try. I found myself having to add layer upon layer (3 total) before I felt good about my base. Normally I just do one layer of the Maybelline. I won't repurchase this one again, but I am open to trying other covergirl products.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't a bad product
customer_reviews.text: It was just okay.. I was expecting it to be a little larger.. I only wore it once (I'm not sure if it gave me a few pimples) 🤔🤔 because it felt oily and a bit heavy on my skin.. I'm use to a lighter weight/feel sunscreen.. I mainly use CoverGirl products.. however, this wasn't for me 🤷 It wasn't a bad product.. but, I wouldn't purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: An immediate favorite! Excellent product. Very moisturizing but not oily. Goes on smooth and blends well. Great coverage and sets nicely with a little powder. Lasts all day and doesn't dry out my skin. Great low price so a win all the way around! I have found my new go-to foundation! Always keeping this on hand! It lasts all day and doesn't irritate my skin. Even ordered some for my Aunt and my daughter! They love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Remy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the reviews and I was so excited about it.....until I put it on. It did literally nothing, it looked like I put some primer on. Now i'm a big fan of a full coverage foundation and I was no-where near expecting that out of this (bought it so I didn't have to do all the steps of a full coverage foundation everyday) but that was just plain ridiculous. I'm very mad that I wasted my money on this. Maybe I got a defective one or something but i'll be getting rid of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well as a tinted moisturizer. I have combination/oily skin and I live in a very humid environment so this works well for me. Doesn't clog my pores and keeps my face feeling fresh all day. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: If you hate foundation this is for you !
customer_reviews.text: I can't say there's a moisturizing effect but I didn't buy it for that reason. And for me the sent is so light I can't hardly smell it so it's perfect for me. But MY SKIN LOOKS BOMB. Okay real talk, I HATE foundation. I have pretty skin to begin with, it's just a little pinkier than I like. This evens everything out and damn do I look good.
customer_reviews.author: The Duncans

customer_reviews.title: Great light coverage for a natural look
customer_reviews.text: Love the light coverage. It does a good job of moisturizing, but doesn't leave any shine, and actually protects against shine during the day. Great for my combination skin. It also gives me a bit of a glow and slightly perfects. This stuff is great for a natural look. It is very light. The fair/light color goes well with my skin tone, which is indeed somewhere between fair and light. Possibly the fact that it is light coverage means that it doesn't have to be an exact match to my skin tone to look good.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shade even for fair skin!
customer_reviews.text: This shade is not too dark for my fair skin in the summertime. In winter I mix it with the "light to medium" shade. This is the best "foundation" for my 75-year old face because it adds a little glow without a cake-like look or feel. It doesn't collect in the wrinkles like heavier products do, and the price is much better! Why is this shade not available in ordinary stores like Walgreens or Target?
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: I don't use anything else.
customer_reviews.text: this takes the place of everything including foundation and sun screen. I don't use anything else. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Tinted Sunscreen without an actual tint
customer_reviews.text: The cream is light and goes on smoothly. No strong scent and easily distributed. It is described as a tinted sunscreen/moisturizer and I ordered "Light to Medium" according to my skin tone. While the cream itself has a color, once on the skin there it becomes invisible. It has zero coverage or tint, which is fine if you're just looking for moisturizing sunscreen. If you do however look for some mild coverage you should choose a different product.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Favorite BB cream for years!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been my favorite for years. I love how it acts as a light moisturizer, sun screen and evens out skin tone a tiny bit all in one product. It makes my skin feel hydrated and a little gooey and if I need more coverage I can mix it with a small amount of foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Db

customer_reviews.title: Matte, sheer tinted, light and non-comedogenic with SPF 21
customer_reviews.text: I like this BB cream's matte, sheer tinted, light and non-comedogenic features and it feels nice on the skin. It offers light coverage, which is just what I wanted. I wasn't sure what SPF rating I was going to receive, since one photo of the tube displayed SPF 15 and another displayed SPF 21, but I was happy to receive tubes with SPF 21. It would be good though if they increased the SPF to at least 30 to offer more protection.
customer_reviews.author: kamibo

customer_reviews.title: Really Like This!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product over my whole face, and then use a more heavy concealer on the blemishes/problem areas and it helps to make my face not look like I'm wearing tons of makeup. This also helps during the dry months to moisturize your face. Very lightweight and feels great putting it on. You don't need a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren MacShara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for some coverage for low maintenance days when I'm dont want to wear foundation. Has no coverage whatsoever, literally like a moisturizer and not a great one at that.
customer_reviews.author: Amran Hizam

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again...
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty normal, clear skin, and this tends to break me out if I use it more than one day in a row. It does smell like sunscreen for those who are wondering, and it gives very light to zero coverage...Also, this makes my skin extremely oily throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Very sheer (almost invisible)
customer_reviews.text: This would be perfect for those looking for a super super super sheer moisturizer. You can layer it up a bit, but even then it is sheer. If you are acne-prone, it didn't break me out, which was great! This personally wasn't what I was looking for. I thought it would be a bit more coverage than it was. But overall an okay product, just not for me at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Do

customer_reviews.title: VERY light coverage. A better moisturizer than foundation.
customer_reviews.text: BB creams always vary in their degree of coverage. This one is definitely less of a foundation and more of a moisturizer. I've been using this for summer instead of typical foundation. To tone down the shine and help with evening out my skin tone, I top this cream with a little tinted pressed powder. The light effect is nice for summer and it hasn't felt overly greasy on my face. It has been working fine but I probably won't order again. I like light coverage, but this may as well be my typically moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with another BB cream, both of which were not sealed. That right there sets off alarms, but I still tried both of them. The Covergirl didn't seem to give me any sort of coverage, but it did make me break out. I have stopped buying anything that goes on my skin from amazon. A discount is not worth the gamble.
customer_reviews.author: Bec E.

customer_reviews.title: No real coverage. Melts into your skin but not in the good way
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should of listened to the reviews. Lol. I wouldn't even consider this a BB cream. It basically sinks into your skin and offers no coverage. I felt like I was just adding another unnecessary layer of product to my face.
customer_reviews.author: Roo3582

customer_reviews.title: My "Foundation" for years
customer_reviews.text: I've used this BB cream as foundation for years and still love it! I wear way less makeup as I get close to 50 than I did in my 20's and 30's and Covergirl Smoothers gives the perfect coverage so my face never feels "caked" with makeup or like product is settling into lines. I feel like it lets my natural skin shine through. In summer months, I usually add a drop of No.7 foundation in Cool Ivory to get the color right as I darken a little in summer and if I have a little redness or a spot or two, I use a little Covergirl Smoothers concealer stick in Fair dotted on with my finger.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica C.

customer_reviews.title: Using this product for 18yrs
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 18yrs, evens skin tone and has spf in it! I can’t say enough good things about this lotion but I wish there were a larger version! A little goes a long way and I rarely use foundation or anything else. My favorite cosmetic product ever and it’s cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S

customer_reviews.title: The best BB cream on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin. This is my GO TO tinted moisturizer. I went out on a limb buying this at first, it was on sale at target. Now I cannot spend a day without it, and the only place I can find it is amazon. Such a light weight perfect addition to any makeup routine. I cannot rave about this product enough. So affordable and so worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Received product with broken seal
customer_reviews.text: Package was ripped open and there was no tamper evident seal covering the opening of tube, which leads me to believe that it was returned by someone who didn’t like the shade. Unfortunately I refuse to use a cosmetic where the integrity was compromised. Not worth my time and trouble to mail it back.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to read

customer_reviews.title: Great product for men and women
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for my skin. Covered mild blemishes and didnt make me look cakey. Im a man and most of the time others can tell when one is wearing make up and will standout. But this product gives great subtle coverage you can wear day to day without anyone ever noticing.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt do much by way of coverage, and its alittle darker than I was expecting, but still a very good light-weight product to just even out your skin tone while also providing sun protection and moisture. I will also say that I needed to reapply after about 5-6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing but made me shiny
customer_reviews.text: I typically love BB cream but this did nothing but make me shiny. Won’t use this brand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: No coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use because I'm trying to stray away from foundation and still get benefits for my skin. Applying this just felt like putting on a cream rather than a tinted BB cream. Made my face super oily (I already have super oily skin) and did not add any coverage at all!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I dont like heavy make up this one feels nice and light. Just enough coverage to reduce redness but let's my freckles show through. Its definitely not a concelar.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ponce

customer_reviews.title: For glow and moisture. Get cc cream if you need coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Little coverage. Not meant to be the only product used unless you want light sunscreen. I used for glow and on top of concealer when I don’t want to use full makeup some days. You do have to rub it in good and allow 10-15 minutes to dry or it will wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Ward

customer_reviews.title: Effective BB Cream for everyone (including other men)
customer_reviews.text: Oh well, as a man I wish “Covergirl BB Cream” could have a more inclusive name to counter the needs of guys, like myself! :) Putting the silly name aside, I use this product daily following Dove’s Men Care Face Lotion and then move onto the liquid foundation (Maybelline Super Stay Full Coverage). This BB Cream allows my foundation to stay intact thought out the day. If some of you guys are new to the art of makeup and want to take it slowly, this tinted BB Cream can be used by itself without a foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Luke T

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Was Very disappointed in this product the color did not match my skin is indicated that it would it also is not moisturizing it’s just seeps into the skin so it looks like you literally use nothing actually kind of drying some kind of disappointed in this product I had some high expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for years and my coworkers love it too. It's light and makes you look good instantly. It doesn't stay on as long as I wish it did but that's prob because I need a primer or something. It doesn't cover dark freckles but it does the lighter ones. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina L

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer natural makeup and this one suits my preference. I mix a drop of foundation to it to add a bit of coverage! Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Haneul Choi

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: There is just enough coverage to conceal blemishes and spots without being thick like other foundations.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought both Cover Girl and Neutrogena tinted moisturizers to compare the two. This one (CG) is by far the winner. The shade is great, it covers well, and moisturizes without making my skin feel oily. Will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M

customer_reviews.title: Blends with skin very well, but it will leave you glistening in the face after a while
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to moisturizer. A trick I learned is to cut off the top area and let the texture of the cream get exposed to the air and when it is applied to your face it is so much better. The only problem is that throughout the day if you have oily skin like me this cream will cause an insane amount of shine and will require a trip to the bathroom for some dabbing with a tissue so your don't look like a glistening sweaty person lol. But it moisturizes and evens skin tone so I can advocate it's good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: dontstopgetitgetit1

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is my every day go to cover up, moisturizer and sunblock.... nice and lightweight......has never made me breakout or clog pores....works into your skin beautifully..... I’ll be pissed if they discontinue it! Doesn’t have a scent which I’m good with.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This provides very light coverage. I use it as a base layer before adding other products. It does not provide full coverage, but I wouldn't expect this type of product to do that. It provides enough coverage when I'm not doing a full make up day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheer coverage moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this stuff in its various incarnations for 8 years. Now that I’m in my late 30’s I’ll admit that I’m in search of something with a tiny bit more coverage, but for the first 2 decades of my makeup wearing life it was the perfect all-in-one. No scent. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Treehouse1

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I always use this moisturizer in the winter time. Because of the tint, I use it in place of foundation. It's light and non greasy. I have tried other tinted moisturizer and always come bake to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: best for oily skin and summer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product especialy for summer for people that dont like foundation easy to apply it has an spf. I have oily skin, and watch this product recommended in a beauty blog as one of the best bb creams for oily skin and it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great for light day moisturizing & coverage
customer_reviews.text: For the money I think this is a great product. It doesn’t cover much but for the days I don’t want to put on a full face of foundation it really does the job for me. I like that it has sunscreen and feels moisturizing. I would recommend if a very light look & moisturizer is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice light coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for many years. I love it. The spf being 21 is so rare on any kind of makeup. It is nice to wear on a daily basis alone, and can be used under heavier makeup as well.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Only base makeup I use.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years, light weight, feels like a moisturizer. Will not give you a ton of coverage, very natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-fan

customer_reviews.title: My only foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is the only foundation that I have worn for almost 5 years. I absolutely love it. It does everything it says, and more.
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: Buy A Different One
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I only wear concealer and a bb cream. My skin hates foundation. This would be great if you didn’t combine any other product with it and you were only wearing this as your skin makeup. When I try to put my concealer over it, it starts looking blotchy and terrible. Cover girl has another good bb cream but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Better than Primer
customer_reviews.text: This cream works like a Primer but better because it's a moisturizer and with my dry skin, that's exactly what I need! It has a little color which acts as a concealer. It also has sunscreen, so that is like a 3 in1 added benefit.
customer_reviews.author: PH419

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, weightless, moisturizing doesn't break me out,sun protection, not cakey.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, weightless on skin not cakey. Brightens face doesn't make you look older if you have mature skin, moisturizes. Does not break me out. Great price and has sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with
customer_reviews.text: This makes my skin look nice and it doesn't make me break out. There is no coverage at all, but I feel like it gives a little life to face. It stays on well and seems to protect from sun
customer_reviews.author: Mary V.

customer_reviews.title: Have used for many years
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Very light and doesn’t crease. Does not offer much coverage which is fine for me. This allows me to use foundation only on a few spots that need more coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Pasillas

customer_reviews.title: Sheerest tint
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fair skin with pink undertones. If you are looking for very sheer tinted moisturizing- this is it. It’s much more sheer than any other bb cream I have ever used but nice if you want something extremely light.
customer_reviews.author: Muggy

customer_reviews.title: BB Cream
customer_reviews.text: I have used Covergirl BB Cream as makeup for several year now. I don't wear a lot of make-up and prefer something light weight on my skin. So it's perfect for me to use as a make-up as it evens out my skin tone without being heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda from OKC

customer_reviews.title: Packaging isn’t the best
customer_reviews.text: Received it opened? I don’t know if I want to put this on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Shades Blendable
customer_reviews.text: The medium dark color is too dark, so I mix with the lighter shade to customize. Nice light feeling wears comfortably anf looks sheer. I like clean makeup typical of Cover Girl.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect daily moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been going through my daily makeup routine lately, which has eliminated the use of a powder to cover up my usual redness. I bought this in the hopes that I would be able to use it as a daily moisturizer, but also smooth out my complexion so that I wasn't looking totally disheveled for zoom calls. I absolutely love it! It is lightweight, provides even coverage that isn't too thick, and has a subtle glow. I'm leaving this review as I'm back on the page to order my second bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new foundation. I hate the way most settle into your pores and fine lines making you look older. This doesn’t do that it is mostly a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Not for cool under-tones.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the light to medium and found it to be way too light, so bought medium to dark... This is probably great if you have warm undertones, I have blue-olive undertones, cool under-tones, and no amount of blending in the world can make this not look weird. I tried, it's just too orange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I like this BB cream, especially in summer. It's light, doesn't cover a lot, but nice if you don't want a heavily made-up look and it goes on smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: kps27

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for many years. The coverage is very light. It is only slightly more than a tinted moisturizer. The color is also good. Not too yellow or pink. I am very fair and fair to light works very well.
customer_reviews.author: hottoepicker

customer_reviews.title: Ummm..
customer_reviews.text: Great moisiturizing, great price! But do not expect much 'tint' or neutralizing effect.. I put this under my tinted moisturizer, I'll just leave that right there.
customer_reviews.author: T.rok

customer_reviews.title: Little less than average
customer_reviews.text: This was a decent moisturizer and maybe 10% of the BB benefits. I wouldn’t say it’s a bad product, just doesn’t have the BB effects of more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This showed no color at all so I guess that’s not the worst, but in my case
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was very concerned about color since I have a hard time matching my pale skin tone. Things seem to either be too warm or too pink for me. This showed no color at all so I guess that’s not the worst, but in my case, I’d rather use a actual moisturizer with better benefits
customer_reviews.author: Real customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This BB cream is amazing! I love it for a day where I wear little to no make up and this just smooths out my skin! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be more light /fair
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good...just felt the lightest shade isn't light enough for very fair skin tones
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Brimer

customer_reviews.title: I like to use this product after moisturizer and before powder ...
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job well, though I have not tested it in directly sunlight yet, as it is winter. I like to use this product after moisturizer and before powder foundation.
customer_reviews.author: rebeck

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Great for protecting your skin while still looking glam! Go for it you wont regret it! (I have T zone oily to dry combination skin)
customer_reviews.author: AnnaBanana143

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine lines & prevention of 'winter dry skin mosaic" on face.
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful in keeping down fine lines & keeping winter dry skin at bay! Grateful for SPF in it, too. Would buy again, DID buy again, and WILL buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K2ofCU

customer_reviews.title: The best BB cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a great BB cream, I have been using this since it was first introduced. My order was well packaged. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Face is Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time instead of make-up. I get compliments on my skin. It's light and does not look like you are made up with putty.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki Wiki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this in the summer for my days out in the sun; it provides excellent coverage and it looks so lovely on my skin. I have started using it underneath my BB cream for extra moisture and I really love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years. It balances my skin tones and feels great going on. Now, if they could come up with biodegradable packaging...it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Saabfan

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years. It is light yet covers skin and flaws. It also provides sun protection without melting.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this for years and love it. The price is competitive. Love getting it delivered. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Fifield

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy If you have redness or blemishes.
customer_reviews.text: I see absolutely no difference after I applied 3 layers. Doesn’t cover redness or blemishes. This is literally for those that have perfect skin already. Upset I wasted money on this.. I guess I’ll use it under my foundation as a sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin olmedo

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Felt very watery, didn’t really seem to cover much, if at all. The color (Fair to Light) was MUCH lighter than other CG BB creams. Bummed to not like it, wanted a good BB with SPF
customer_reviews.author: SamMap

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It's lightweight and provides the perfect coverage for me. It evens out my skintone but doesn't feel like I'm wearing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This product if applied correctly does the job wonderfully. I tend to have a fair to oul complexion and this makes me feel like a light lotion is on my face and added a tint of tan as well. Definitely my favorite tinted moisturizer ever.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Makeup for the low maintenance!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a daily makeup wearer, but wanted something to even my skin tone a little for when I do wear makeup, without the mess that is foundation. This does the trick. Used the whole thing and came back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca DuBois

product_meta.title: COVERGIRL Smoothers Lightweight BB Cream, Fair to Light 805, 1.35 oz (Packaging May Vary) Lightweight Hydrating 10-In-1 Skin Enhancer with SPF 21 UV Protection
product_meta.description: Color:805 FAIR TO LIGHT| Size:1 CountGet 10 skin-friendly benefits from one cream with COVERGIRL Smoothers BB Cream. This lightweight formula with broad spectrum SPF 21 protection provides all-day hydration and blends effortlessly with your skin tone. You get sheer coverage for natural-looking radiance that leaves your skin feeling smooth.
feature_bullets: COVERGIRL Smoothers BB Cream answers 10 of your skincare needs in a single tube. Pamper your skin with an instant skin enhancer that provides natural radiance along with a combination of all day hydration, lightweight, sheer coverage, and SPF 21 protection
Protects skin from uv damage and prevents uneven skin tone and the appearance of wrinkles

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
